xuiEventPropagationService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides event propagation rules for XUI components.

Methods

  • targetShouldPropagate($event)

    Search the value on the items within the given properties.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    $eventJQueryEventObject

    Event to handle propagation.

    Returns
    boolean

    Value indicating whether that event should be propagated.
